tool_description: Generates marketing content including product descriptions, titles, and feature lists based on product specifications and target audience.

product_name.description: Name of the product for content generation

key_features.description: Array of key product features and specifications

target_audience.description: Target customer segment: general, professional, budget, premium, or tech_savvy

content_tone.description: Writing tone: formal, casual, persuasive, or informative

word_count_limit.description: Maximum word count for generated description

error_messages: Invalid target audience: Use one of [general, professional, budget, premium, tech_savvy]
Invalid content tone: Use one of [formal, casual, persuasive, informative]
Insufficient features provided: Include at least one key feature for content generation
Word count limit exceeded: Reduce word_count_limit or provide more specific features
usage: Specify product_name, product_category, key_features, and target_audience; optionally set content_tone and word_count_limit for customized content generation.

bullet_points.description: Key selling points formatted as bullet points
